home.description: Start by creating your restaurant and uploading your first menu.

auth.signInDescription: Access your restaurant dashboard and manage your digital menus
auth.termsAgreement: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

errors.configuration: There was a problem with the server configuration. Please try again later.
errors.accessDenied: Access denied. You do not have permission to sign in.
errors.verification: The verification link was invalid or has expired.
errors.default: An unexpected error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
